metadata.title: A Straight Flush Mixed With Jokers

tracks.text: Trophies for Kei Uomi
Message, auto-translate, I'm looking forward to a rematch with you. My "Meteors" will beat your "Lava" again at the next GGC.
Kei clenches his fist.
Email message. To, Sunraku, Pencil Knight
Global Game Competition
He clicks Send
Sunraku's muscular body, covered in the scars of Lycagon's mark, walks across an expanse under the night sky and nearly full moon.
Debris floats
Backdropped by lightning, text reads, Shangri-La Frontier
Ink sketch of Sunraku's face. The ink splatters, and Emul falls through it. Sunraku catches her, and she crawls onto his shoulder. Behind him is a picture of Rakuro
Pencilgon smiles at us. Behind her is a picture of Towa Amane.
Katzo's hands burn with fire. Behind her is Kei Uomi.
Psyger strikes the grown with the purple long sword Antinomy.
A nest of interlocking lines forms. Ceecrue, a white rabbit samurai, leaps across them.
Outstretched hands form a diamond. Akitsu Akane's face smiles in the gap.
Rust holds a bow and Mold holds a staff.
Chains wrap around Sunraku's legs
Rakuro reaches up a hand. A hand reaches towards the metal spine in the ruins of past glories.
Psyger-0, Sunraku, Katzo, and Pencilgon stand side by side.
The chains shatter.
In red, fishmen wield swords and race towards the party in a circle.
The fishmen charge a boy wearing a pirate hat at the wheel of a ship.
A mermaid fights a shark.
Giant octopus arms wrap around a tattered ship
A girl with blue eyes and white hair dances. Star Rain, Sylvia Goldberg. She falls into the floor, the floor rotates, and a white super hero replaces her. Galaxia Series, The Meteus
A brown haired girl turns into a tree girl. Nitro Squad.
In front of her stands an old man samurai and a young man with gauntlets.
A whale swims, its face engulfed with fire. It approaches an expanse with floating debris. Sunraku walks.
Lightning crackles across the whale. It opens its mouth. Darkness.
Text, 42, A Straight Flush Mixed with Jokers
The party stands in an alley
Human Emul walks to a wall and holds out her arms. The white door appears.
Sunraku and Emul walk through the door.
Akane stares at Psyger
Rakuro's house, day time
Rumi exits, closes the door, and runs off. She wears an asymmetric black top and a single side pony tail.
Rakuro sits in his gamer chair looking at a tablet and drinking from a pouch labeled Ene-jelly
His eyes have dark circles
He sends a message to Pencil Knight
He'll owe us big if we do it, so I'll hear him out.
He sits on his bed next to his VR goggles.
He lies back and picks up the goggles. In SLF, Sunraku wears full body armor.
The armor shatters
She makes Gilta Brill appear
She headbutts Sunraku
Text, Fifticia Shipyard
Sunraku walks. Emul wrapped her ears around his neck, in disguise
He sees a pub with steering wheels mounted to the outside
He approaches the door
A man goes flying through the door. Sunraku side steps.
He sees Lycagon's Scar
Rust punches. Sunraku side steps. Her fist hits the wall
Emul flies through the air and hits Rust in the face.
They sit at a table together. Emul eats a carrot.
The other people in the pub stare
Imagining Blackbeard
Imagines Rust punching NPC's
A shadow approaches the doorway
Sunraku turns
A small boot crosses the threshold
Sunraku eyes widen
The person wears a pink coat and red sash.
Emul's eyes widen
The person points a finger
A 10 year old in boy points at them. He has short brown hair and brown eyes.
Text, Self-described "Great Pirate" Stude
Name, Guyarque (Evil Menace)
The other NPC's stare apprehensively
Unique Scenario, Find the Abyss's Disciples, Begin now?
He looks at the others. Rust nods. Mold nods.
He clicks yes
Men wander the docks.
He comes to a stop. A ship bears 2 large masts with furled up sails. The Brig is painted red.
Stude puts on the captain's hat
She looks at him questioningly
The brawny men drop 2 barrels
The brawny men run away. The party of 4 stare at the barrels
Psyger-0
The other barrel starts to wobble
It falls over. Akane and Ceecrue crawl out
Psyger flexes and shatters her barrel.
Pixel art title card. Blue text over a starry background spell Shangri-La Frontier
Sunraku holds blue blades and stands in an underwater town.
Pencilgon holds a golden spear and stands in the hidden garden
Katzo holds up fists and stands by the Teardrop lake
Psyger crosses her arms and stands in the Lightless Barrens
Montage of the game store, the Utopia headquarters, the palace, Rabbituza, a tower, and Fifticia.
Sunraku runs across an underwater town. Fish swim in the air. Seaweed lines the street.
Katzo runs across the cave floor on the shores of the Teardrop lake
A serpent emerges from the lake. Crab pincers snap.
Montage of items. Log. Bow. Twin blue blades. Grimoire. Mana potion. Cards.
Pencilgon runs across the hidden garden. Red spider lilies blow in the breeze, surrounded by cavernous walls, under a full moon.
Ceecrue, Rust, Sunraku, Akane, Mold, and Psyger walk along a dock. A crescent moon shines over the sea.
The Scarlet Whale floats at sea. A giant octopus leg reaches up.
Rakuro, Towa, Kei, and a brown haired woman walk along an urban street. Cars drive by.
Montage. The Sage of Awakening. Akane's fox mask. A person in a yellow demon mask. An old man samurai. The beetle helm. A gas mask.
Blue text over a black background spells Shangri-La Frontier
